page.title: 01Forest of Dean-Coleford
page.content: "Happy is the eye, That lives 'twixt The{Severn}and the{Wye."}This well describes the position of{Coleford}in the{Forest}of Dean.Built up areas of {Berry Hill,Mile End,Broadwell,Coalway and{Milkwall}encircle it,further surrounded by farmland,which in turn is enclosed by forest.Residential area privately and council owned.Forest managed by{Forestry Commission}for Crown. 1.Contents 11.School Year 2.Coleford 1 12.School Day 3.Coleford 2 13.Family Day 4.Industry 14.My Day 5.Forestry Commission 15.News 1 6.Tourism 16.News 2 7.Sites of Interest 17.News 3 8.Events 18.Animals 9.Farming 19.Plant Life 10.Berry Hill 20.Geology
